Metadata.name: Custom Sub Menu (P4G CEP ver.)
Metadata.author: AnimatedSwine37, ShrineFox, Sierrai17, rudiger__gb, Tekka, Tupelov
Metadata.description:
A large collection of quality-of-life mods which can be customized from the sub menu.
Quick Travel Plus Mobile Calendar Dungeon Options Find a Friend Remove Lunchtime Invitations Reap-Balanced Encounters Default Direct Commands Dungeon Text Fixes Scooter Ride Count No More Dimmed Dungeon Music Game Over Skip (disabled by default) Remove Events (disabled by default)
To configure the mod, open the sub menu (X / Square) and press the command menu button (Y / Triangle).
Some mods have been removed from this version of Custom Sub Menu to improve cross-compatibility and reduce the risk of softlocks. Download the full version of the mod from the GitHub link if you would like to use these features.
